snippet: The opposition Liberal Democrats scuttled a budget bill, dealing a blow to the ruling Democratic Party and darkening Japan’s economic outlook.
abstract: Political standoff forces Japan to postpone budget spending for the first time in decades, underscoring the beleaguered state of the country's ruling party; action further clouds the country's economic outlook.
lead_paragraph: The opposition Liberal Democrats scuttled a budget bill, dealing a blow to the ruling Democratic Party and darkening Japan’s economic outlook.

headline.seo: Political Impasse Forces Japan to Delay Spending
headline.main: Impasse in Japan Forces Delay in Spending
headline.print_headline: Impasse in Japan Forces Delay in Spending
